page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: A large variety of different employment was found although principally in this area it is agriculture 80% are employed directly in farming such as fruit growing,hop growing, cereal growing, vegetable growing or as employees of Agricultural Suppliers such as seed merchants, chemical suppliers, contractors, machinery distributors, building contractors haulage companies There are very few people employed in livestock farming in this particular area Other forms of employment include Company Directors usually based in the local towns some 10 miles away Hospital staff based in the local towns some 10 miles distant Commuting to London
